description.value:
Counts as a Back Banner (If Kill-Team's Leader, when spending Fate Point to regain Cohesion, regain +1 extra). Can choose one enemy type to be displayed as a trophy, be it a race, organisation, or specific foe. When fighting members of that race, organisation, or foe, character counts as having Fear +1. Character may first have to defeat such a foe to be able to display the trophy.

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: White Scars

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
